title: City Shapes
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 40 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 90L
description: Among the sights of the city, there are many interesting shapes to be found. City Shapes is a colorful guide to the many shapes hidden in metropolitan landscapes. Detailed photographs support students' learning as they practice visualizing and classifying information.
meta: hexagons, oval, rectangles, shapes, squares, triangles
Final Consonants : Discriminate final consonant /s/ sound
Declarative Sentences : Identify and use declarative sentences
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency words here, many, see

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
